typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> UserTblSource
source(output(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DestinationData
UserTblSource, DestinationData exists(UserTblSource@Key == DestinationData@Key,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExistsdatadestination
UserTblSource, DestinationData exists(UserTblSource@Key == DestinationData@Key,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRowDestination
NotExistsdatadestination sink(input(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Key,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Last_m
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UserDestinationSink
AlterRowDestination sink(input(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Key,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Last_m
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
